pageContext.claim: “I can absolutely do it if I want to. And I don't think I'm going to have to, because it's starting to open up. We need our churches and our synagogues and our mosques. We want them open: churches, synagogues, mosques and other. We want them open, and we want them open as soon as possible.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump does not have the authority to order states to reopen religious institutions.
